identity.name: Behm Funeral Management
identity.primary_archetype: Organic & Earthy (Trust, Calm) mixed with Swiss Clarity

rules: Use Playfair Display for all Page Titles and Section Headings (h1, h2).
Use Inter for all data tables, forms, and body text.
Never use pure black text. Use Slate-900 (#0F172A) for headings and Slate-600 (#475569) for body.

layout.spacing_scale: Generous. Use p-6 or p-8 for cards. Gap-6 for grids.

buttons.primary: bg-[#1B2A41] text-white hover:bg-[#2C3E50] shadow-sm transition-all duration-200 font-medium px-6 py-2.5
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-[#1B2A41] border border-slate-200 hover:bg-slate-50 shadow-sm transition-all duration-200 font-medium px-6 py-2.5

cards.default: bg-white border border-slate-200 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-300 p-6 rounded-lg
cards.metric: bg-white border-l-4 border-[#1B2A41] shadow-sm p-6 rounded-r-lg

inputs.default: bg-white border-slate-200 focus:border-[#1B2A41] focus:ring-1 focus:ring-[#1B2A41] rounded-md h-11

tables.header: bg-slate-50 text-slate-600 font-medium uppercase text-xs tracking-wider border-b border-slate-200
tables.row: hover:bg-slate-50 transition-colors border-b border-slate-100 text-sm text-slate-700

visual_enhancers.shadows: shadow-sm for cards, shadow-lg for dropdowns/modals. Avoid heavy drop shadows.
visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle noise texture on the login page background over the navy gradient.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use backdrop-blur-md bg-white/80 for sticky headers only.

assets.icons: Use Lucide React icons. Stroke width 1.5px for a refined look.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is Slate-600 or darker on white backgrounds.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible focus rings using ring-2 ring-offset-2 ring-[#1B2A41].
accessibility.aria: All interactive elements must have aria-labels if no text is present.

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text.
Use 'Playfair Display' ONLY for headings. Use 'Inter' for everything else.
All interactive elements must have data-testid attributes.
Use Recharts for charts (clean, minimal lines, no heavy fills).

setup: Configure Tailwind theme to match the color palette.
Create a 'Layout' component that includes the Sidebar and Topbar.

pages.login: Split screen. Left side: Login form (clean, minimal). Right side: Navy background with the ocean image overlay (opacity 20%) and a quote about service/dignity.
pages.dashboard: Bento Grid layout. Top row: Key Metrics (Cases, Revenue). Middle: Recent Cases Table. Right: Quick Actions.
pages.cases_list: Full-width table. Filters in a clean bar above. Status badges using soft pastel backgrounds (e.g., bg-blue-50 text-blue-700).
pages.case_detail: Two-column layout. Left: Case Information (Forms). Right: Financials & Payments (Sticky card).
